definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.chinese: 我的民族標準語是漢語。

sentences.english: We should learn the standard speech to better communicate.
sentences.chinese: 爲了便於溝通，我們大家要學好標準語。

sentences.english: I want to talk with people when they are using their mother tongue.
sentences.chinese: 我想要和別人交談，用她們的民族標準語。
我的民族標準語是漢語。
